Description: Small amulet of a Wadjet eye, made of vivid turquoise faience. The base is flat, the upper side is textured and shows an intact right wedjat eye. The perforation runs along its longitudinal side.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), D14.29, upper level
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
